A holy barrier is a magical force-field that can be found deep within the Hallowed Sepulchre. The holy barriers were conjured by Saradominist mages during the Third Age in order to protect the coffins of the fallen justiciar from the vampyres that hunted them. In order to activate the barrier and be permitted to pass through, one must sacrifice two piles of vampyre dust at a Saradomin brazier (or just one pile if wearing a hallowed symbol).


Skill info[edit | edit source]

Agility experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return.

A '''holy barrier''' is a magical force-field that can be found deep within the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The holy barriers were conjured by [[Saradomin|Saradominist]] mages during the [[Third Age]] in order to protect the [[Coffin_(Hallowed_Sepulchre)|coffins]] of the fallen [[justiciar]] from the [[vampyres]] that hunted them. In order to activate the barrier and be permitted to pass through, one must sacrifice two piles of [[vampyre dust]] at a [[Saradomin brazier]] (or just one pile if wearing a [[hallowed symbol]]).


==Skill info==
Agility experience is only awarded on the first crossing and return.
